name: Shopper Location
headline: Set shipping address based on user browser's or IP Geolocation
overview: This app attempts to determine the user's location if not already known, first by requesting permission to use their browser's geolocation feature, then by looking up their location based on their IP address as a fallback. The location is stored in the shippingData section of the orderForm.
features: Address form according to the country
Manually set address in the modal
